cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a variant of the multi-armed bandit problem that involves budget constraints, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The paper also proposes new policies for solving this problem, which involves optimization and decision-making (cs.DS). The paper also includes theoretical analysis of the proposed policies, which involves game theory and information theory (cs.GT, cs.IT).
